price: 68. And if they argue with you (as regards the slaughtering of the sacrifices), say "Allâh knows best of what you do.
arabic: وَإِن جَٰدَلُوكَ فَقُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wa-in jādalūka faquli al-lahu aʿlamu bimā taʿmalūna
